thread.title: Class up your office with a bamboo wireless keyboard
thread.title_full: Class up your office with a bamboo wireless keyboard

author: cbennett@dailydot.com (Colette Bennett)
title: Class up your office with a bamboo wireless keyboard
text:
Photo via Amazon (CC-BY-SA) This is definitely a good look. 
If the average keyboard doesn't appeal to you and you'd like something with a bit more style, you might find that a bamboo keyboard suits you just right. 
This keyboard and mouse set is not only very striking, but it's also wireless (after all, wires would just clutter up the look!). According to the reviews on Amazon, the keyboard is full-sized and completely wood (no plastic parts). It also comes with a free touch pen, so you're getting three items in the deal. 
The keyboard works with both Windows and Mac products, so anyone can use it. For $42.99 , it's not only a great way to make your office more attractive, but it's a conversation starter when people visit your workspace and realize how stylish you are.
